inclusion.criterion: peritoneal dialysis at the investigators hospital for more than 6 months with higher pro-inflammation serum cytokine levels (C-reactive protein > 0.2mg/dL)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Atorvastatin (40mg/day) would be given to those who were allocated to the intervention group
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: disease, cardiomyopathy, pericardial disease and renal insufficiency
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: History of hypersensitivity to any of the study drugs
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass, and presents with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy, which showed pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
